title: Calculator made with JS
description: Calculator inspired by the iOS calculator, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project faithfully recreates the interface and functionality, offering basic and advanced operations with a responsive and interactive design. Perfect for users seeking an intuitive and elegant calculation experience directly in the browser.

title: Virtual birthday card
description: Virtual birthday card developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Upon accessing the page, a congratulatory message appears, followed by a charming animation where multiple hearts float upwards. This project combines an interactive and delightful design, perfect for sending a unique and heartfelt digital birthday greeting.
